com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.rpmfailfile

Class RPMFailFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ipt.ebsa.manage.deploy.rpmfailfile.RPMFailFileManager

  • public class RPMFailFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the generation of an RPM fail file report as part of the deployment into a given zone

    • Method Detail

      • reportFailFiles

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reportFailFiles(com.ipt.ebsa.config.Organisation org,
                                                               java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> zonesInScope)
        Loops through application short names and generates an RPM fail file report for the deployment into the given zone. An MC operation is triggered and the resulting JSON parsed. Returns a map where the key is an FQDN and the value is either 'Failed RPM File exists' or an empty string. Returns an empty map if there was an error running the MC command or parsing the response.
        Parameters:
        deployment -
        applicationShortNames - collection
        Returns:

      • reportFailFiles

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> reportFailFiles(com.ipt.ebsa.config.Organisation org,
                                                               java.lang.String zoneName)
        Generates an RPM fail file report for the deployment into the given zone. An MC operation is triggered and the resulting JSON parsed. Returns a map where the key is an FQDN and the value is either 'Failed RPM File exists' or an empty string. Returns an empty map if there was an error running the MC command or parsing the response.
        Parameters:
        deployment -
        applicationShortName -
        Returns:
